welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Voorburg! Known for its rich history and picturesque surroundings, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Business Terminal
terminals.description: The business terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport is dedicated to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
